channel.title: Some help

item.title: Some help
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

I’m trying to make my client able to change the ip through the menu

                        chatTextDrawingArea.method389(true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Port:" + port + ((loginScreenCursorPos == 3) & (loopCycle % 40 < 20) ? "" : ""), j);
                        j += 15;
			chatTextDrawingArea.method389(true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Username: " + capitalize(myUsername) + ((loginScreenCursorPos == 0) & (loopCycle % 40 < 20) ? "@yel@|" : ""), j);
			j += 15;
			chatTextDrawingArea.method389(true, c / 2 - 88, 0xffffff, "Password: " + TextClass.passwordAsterisks(myPassword) + ((loginScreenCursorPos == 1) & (loopCycle % 40 < 20) ? "@yel@|" : ""), j);
                        j += 15;
                        chatTextDrawingArea.method389(true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Server IP: " + server + ((loginScreenCursorPos == 2) & (loopCycle % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j);

But basicly, I can’t edit the server ip: and port: part. Only the username and password. I’m using renamed deob. Do any of you know how to make me able to change them?

Read full topic
